Articles.Content:
So a friend and i have spent some weekends over about a year slowly developing a solid motor with a KNO3/Al

here is a funny burn ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/DCispdOaD_k?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

plenty more on the account, it has some earlier burns however our developed motor has not yet flown since things have been put on hold ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Edit: Kerbal quality launch 

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/__bCQwFjUg8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> So a friend and i have spent some weekends over about a year slowly developing a solid motor with a KNO3/Al
> 
> here is a funny burn ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> 
> <iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/DCispdOaD_k?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
> 
> plenty more on the account, it has some earlier burns however our developed motor has not yet flown since things have been put on hold ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

SSSSSSSSS-boom!

it was doing a creeper impersonation, methinks

> 
> SSSSSSSSS-boom!
> 
> it was doing a creeper impersonation, methinks

That's a very nice Booster you have there...
